main event: A civilian reported observing an object resembling the size of the planet Venus in Biloxi, Mississippi on September 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object emitted a steady white light and hovered in the sky,The object moved up and down, reversed direction, and then disappeared into a cloud.,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was described as very maneuverable and wavered occasionally according to the witness.,The daughter of the witness called attention to the object when it made a 98-degree turn.
sighted object: an object about the size of the planet Venus
